name: The Anomaly (Jobegiar99)
description:
The Anomaly This is my submission for the final project of the first course of the MSU Game Design and Development Specialization.

My personal touch for this project was:
  • Add a story

  • Develop an algorithm to generate alien colonies

  • Add a final boss

  • Compose the final boss theme

  • Create the sprite of the boss projectiles and boss first stage helpers

Credits

  • Developed by: José Bernardo Girón Arana (Jobegiar99)

  • Boss Sprite: Forgot to take the source but I found it on google images when searching "Lovecraft Alien Pixel Art" and couldn't find it again :( I applied some effects with Juice FX for the animations.

  • Boss Roar: Terraria Boss Spawn Sound Effect

  • Boss effects: Juice FX
